messages.messageBody:
Oh, the woes of an Ebay widow....
Ebay is an online auction site that my DH has graciously found and made his
personal homepage (well not homepage, but he has it in his favorites) If he
could make it his homepage, he probably would...
Hohum...
Stephanie of
Ron and Stephanie
